verbs.description: [ARG1: red sox parade] [V: set] [ARG2: for wednesday] boston mayor martin j walsh and boston red sox officials said the team will celebrate their world series win with a duck boat parade through the streets of boston on wednesday walsh announced the parade schedule at city hall monday this is an all - time great team that we had ’’ walsh said of the red sox and manager alex cora we are a city of champions so let us celebrate like champions walsh had tweeted about the parade minutes after the martin j walsh boston boston red sox official martin j walsh red sox
